summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley discussing strategic business decisions in the context of the economic climate. Epstein emphasizes the need for immediate changes and the importance of acting quickly to capitalize on market opportunities.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is communicating strategic business advice to Jes Staley regarding asset management and investment banking.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of Epstein's email, which discusses business strategies and market conditions.

persons.name: Jamie
persons.context: Jamie is referenced as a decision-maker whose direction will influence the business strategies discussed in the email.

connections.description: Epstein provides business advice to Staley regarding asset management and investment banking strategies.
Staley is awaiting direction from Jamie, who is in a decision-making position regarding the business strategies discussed.

keyFacts: The email discusses the need for immediate changes in business strategy due to the economic climate.
Epstein emphasizes that it will take 18 months to two years to fully implement the changes.
He mentions the importance of acting quickly to secure good deals in the market.
Epstein refers to Jamie as a key decision-maker in the business strategy.
The email suggests that there are great people available in the market who may not be available for long.
